ja386:5.2: vastaṃ → bhastaṃ (bj, pts1) | kalakaṃ (s2, s3) | garaṃ (mr)
ja386:6.1: Tvaṃ khopi → tvaṃ nu kho (bj, s2, s3) | tvaṃ ca kho (pts1)
ja386:7.1: Aparampi samma te bālyaṃ → ayampi samma te bālo (mr)
ja386:9.2: bhariyāya yo padassati → bhariyā yo padassati (pts1) | bhariyā na bhavissati (mr)
ja386:10.1: Na ve piyammeti → na piyammeti (s2, s3) | na piyameti (mr) | na piyamedanti (katthaci)
